name: NSDraggingImageComponent
desc: A single object in a dragging item.

items.name: init(key: NSDraggingItem.ImageComponentKey)
items.desc: Initializes and returns a dragging image component with the specified key.

items.name: var key: NSDraggingItem.ImageComponentKey
items.desc: The unique name of this image component instance.

items.name: var contents: Any?
items.desc: An object providing the image contents of the component.

items.name: var frame: NSRect
items.desc: The coordinate space is the bounds of the parent dragging item.
